title: Inner self seeking..
review: Three friends from Bremerhaven want to shoot a movie about an expedition to the Antarctic and the associated difficulties. Via Buenos Aires they travel to Ushuaia and board an expedition ship to reach their destination. What they are finally filming there is nice to look at, but in its cognitive value hardly reaches beyond informative nature documentaries. The actual theme of the film, garnished with countless life-wisdom, seems to be the search for oneself
